attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This facility is a valuable part of it's local area. It's students are an integral part of Totnes and the local economy, so it's not just a case of losing a great educational establishment, but a serious blow to the many traders, shops, pubs, and cafes to name a few. Surely a grant from the lottery is in order?

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save Dartington College of Art."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12532.asp

Prime Minister's Office
